parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular

str2: From paraballo; a similitude, i.e. fictitious narrative, apothegm or adage.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: From en and histemi; to place on hand, i.e. impend, be instant.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
A gift, present. A present; specially, a sacrifice.
Abstr. and concr: sacrifice; a sacrifice, offering. From thuo; sacrifice.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pros and phero; to bear towards, i.e. Lead to, tender, treat.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
From teleios; to complete, i.e. accomplish, or consummate.
The conscience, a persisting notion. From a prolonged form of suneido; co-perception, i.e. Moral consciousness.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To serve, especially God, perhaps simply: I worship. From latris; to minister, i.e. Render religious homage.
